name: Let There Be Peace
description:
How To Play: Before the tension bar at the top fills up you must strike a deal with both side. Select cards to help boost you chances of getting a successful deal but be careful card can lose or gain you trust of either party. If your trust hits zero with one party you lose.

Types Rounds

Choose Location: Does nothing, choose any but to start.

Party One: Choose cards that effect party one .

Party Two: Choose cards that effect party two.

Draft Deal: Choose who gains what in the treaty or choose to play another round of cards, certain leader traits affect the result.  If the deal fails tension will build up faster.
